summary: A willful woman concocts an elaborate scheme to trap a handsome pediatrician into marriage.
cast: Cary Grant|Franchot Tone|Diana Lynn|Betsy Drake|Alan Mowbray|Elisabeth Risdon|Richard Gaines|Harry Hayden|Chick Chandler|Leon Belasco|Fred Essler|Anna Q. Nilsson|Eddie Albert|Jean Andren|Chet Brandenburg|Arnolda Brown|Helen Brown|Rosalie Coughenour|Claire Du Brey|Arthur 'Weegee' Fellig|Bess Flowers|Dan Foster|Louise Franklin|Joseph Granby|James Griffith|Lois Hall|Patricia Hall|Charmienne Harker|Sam Harris|Carol Hughes|John Indrisano|Selmer Jackson|Kate Drain Lawson|Joanne Lybrook|Anne Nagel|William J. O'Brien|Al Rhein|Elaine Riley|Shimen Ruskin|Gwynne Shipman|Larry Steers|Alvina Tomin|Marjorie Walker
title: En busca de marido
